posts.post_content:
I have a few T206's and a T210 for sale.  Scans can be viewed [URL="https://picasaweb.google.com/109683690576252603647/ForSaleForTrade"]HERE[/URL].

Prices include shipping and Paypal.  Contact me via PM or email [url]abravefan@msn.com[/url]

T206
Lavender SGC40 SC350/30 - SOLD
Chappelle SGC40 P350 - SOLD
Merritt SGC30 SC350/30 - SOLD
H. Davis RAW SC150/649 - SOLD
H. Davis PSA1(MK) SC150/649 - SOLD
Pickering RAW P350 - $45 (Same name top and bottom)
Ganzel RAW P350 - $50 (Miscut showing two backs)

T210
Mulldowney SGC50 - SOLD

I will take the Chappelle and the Lavander

Thanks!

If the member who bought the: H. Davis RAW SC150/649 wants to flip it, I would be interested. PM me. If not, no worries. Enjoy.
~Chris.
Got my two cards safe and sound, thank you OP.  Good seller
